SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel

Class ViewModelState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel.ModelObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel.ViewModelState
public class ViewModelState extends ModelObservable
The object ViewModelState represents an image of the current situation of the model for the client. This class is a singleton, and the constructor is private because it is used only to instantiate the object one single time, and then only modify that instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewModelState

      private ViewModelState()
      The constructor of the class ViewModelState. The variables are instantiated but not updated, because when it is created, the client is in the menu, so this data doesn't exist.

      The method to access the singleton.
      Returns:
